<!-- Code generated from the comments of the ImageFilterOptions struct in builder/ecs/run_config.go; DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY -->

- `name` (string) - Specifies the image name. Exact matching is used.

- `owner` (string) - Specifies the owner to which the image belongs.

- `visibility` (string) - Whether the image is available to other tenants. Available values include:
  *public*, *private*, *market*, and *shared*.
